name: FoundryVTT
description: Foundry Virtual Tabletop is software that provides an innovative online role-playing experience. The software supports Windows, Mac, and Linux and allows you to self-host a game server that players connect to for free directly through a web browser.
short_desc: Foundry Virtual Tabletop is software that provides an innovative online role-playing experience
author: https://hub.docker.com/r/felddy/
